title: 68. Fireside with the Underboss - "This Moment Made Me A Different Kind Of Gangster"
description: Right after getting married, one of Sammy's friends reaches out and asks for his help. Not a short while after, Sammy found himself trying to sneak 800lbs of drugs under his wife's nose.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Right after getting married, one of Sammy's friends reaches out and asks for his help. Not a short while after, Sammy found himself trying to sneak 800lbs of drugs under his wife's nose.
